description: Product of the digits of n divides the sum of the digits of n.
mathematica: Do[If[Mod[Apply[Plus, IntegerDigits[n]], Apply[Times, IntegerDigits[n]]]==0, Print[n]], {n, 1, 100000}]pdsQ[n_]:=Module[{idn=IntegerDigits[n]},!MemberQ[idn,0] && Divisible[ Total[idn],Times@@idn]]; Select[Range[12000],pdsQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 07 2011 *)
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 17 2000
